public.name: Not a sudoer?
public.description: You aren't in the sudoers file. This incident will be reported. (Run the `!sudo` command on a command you do not have permission to.)

public.name: Baby Tester
public.description: Open your first issue on [Amy's GitHub](https://github.com/gideontong/Amy/issues). This can be a bug report *or* a feature request!

public.name: Advanced Tester
public.description: Open an issue on [Amy's GitHub](https://github.com/gideontong/Amy/issues) and have it marked as a bug. You're a bug hunter now!

public.name: Code Writer!
public.description: Open a pull request to [Amy on GitHub](https://github.com/gideontong/Amy) with at least 1 code change. You're a code writer now!

public.name: Jack of All Trades
public.description: Use every command available to you (all non-admin commands). Amy thanks you for your support!

public.name: You're so annoying!
public.description: Get Amy to annoy someone for you. It's not that hard!

public.name: Speak the Truth
public.description: Call Leo gay. It doesn't matter how he responds, you spoke the truth.

public.name: Get Dunked On
public.description: Discover every sarcastic comment Kevin can make. With such a low response rate, you must talk a lot!

public.name: Become the Truth
public.description: Change your status such that you are now playing Leo, no matter what he changed his nickname to. Does that mean you are gay?
